Key Match Events: Tyrese Haliburton continued his impressive play with 16 points and 13 assists, orchestrating the Pacers' efficient offense.
Pascal Siakam led the charge with 26 points, while Thomas Bryant added a season-high 22 points and 8 rebounds.
Post-Match Reflections: The Indiana Pacers cruised to a convincing 129-113 victory over the Chicago Bulls last night, extending their winning streak to four games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls, despite Zach LaVine's 31 points, struggled to keep pace with Indiana's offensive firepower and couldn't overcome a significant early deficit.
Others: The game was played on January 9, 2025.
The Pacers' hot streak continues with this win over the Bulls.
